case.title: Good looking Asian man seeking attractive women for friendship! - 29 ( London)
case.text:
Hi there,
I'm a kind caring, honest,mature,open minded, friendly, good sense of humor single fun guy., living and working in London, I would like to meet a nice attractive white or Eastern European women for friendship.
Please reply within London region Only, and please attach your picture if you would like a reply back from me.
This is a genuine ad so no time wasters or spam mails.
Regards
